pro bono.translation[0].definitions[0].d: used to describe work that someone, especially a lawyer, does without getting paid
pro bono.translation[1].definitions[0].d: used to describe work done by a lawyer or other professional for which they do not charge a payment
pro bono.translation[1].definitions[0].e: 42% of attorneys surveyed reported doing some pro bono work last year.
Mr. Kunstler is handling the case pro bono.
